properties.address: ACE 16-18 Chantry Way, Andover, Hampshire SP10 1RL
properties.description: Our community space is open to everyone and offers comfortable sofas, free tea, coffee, snacks, and welcoming faces. You can participate in various activities such as crafts, puzzles, games, and children's areas, as well as raffles and much more. Our goal is to combat social isolation, food poverty, fuel poverty, and provide information on community services. Open 10-3pm Monday- Friday term time
properties.title: ACE Community lounge and Warm space

properties.description: A warm friendly space in the centre of Andover.
